column5: Perfectly located. 1-mile from Downtown. 1-mile to the Museum District. Enjoy the urban green space, public art & jogging trail. Baldwin Park is 150-feet from the door-step. Walk to several restaurants, bars, museums & shops. 8-blocks to the METRO-Rail. Professionally clean with no cleaning fee!Relaxing way to enjoy the city...
column8: Stylish Midtown Townhouse w/ park view
